languages.text: {n}...а затем из его запястья с щелчком выскакивает длинное, покрытое вонючей смазкой лезвие. Спустя мгновение оно погружается в вашу плоть.{/n}
{n}...then something in his wrist clicks, and a long blade coated with something foul thrusts out of it. A moment later, the blade sinks into your flesh.{/n}

languages.text: {n}…その時、彼の手首の何かがカチッと音を立て、そこから何か汚いもので覆われた長い刃が突き出た。 一瞬の間に、刃は肉体の中に消えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...then something in his wrist clicks, and a long blade coated with something foul thrusts out of it. A moment later, the blade sinks into your flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}…その時、彼の手首の何かがカチッと音を立て、そこから何か汚いもので覆われた長い刃が突き出た。 一瞬の間に、刃は肉体の中に消えた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}……随后，他手腕上的什么东西发出了“咔哒”一声。一把涂着秽物的长刀从里面刺了出来，刀刃恐怕很快就会刺到你的肉里。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...then something in his wrist clicks, and a long blade coated with something foul thrusts out of it. A moment later, the blade sinks into your flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}……随后，他手腕上的什么东西发出了“咔哒”一声。一把涂着秽物的长刀从里面刺了出来，刀刃恐怕很快就会刺到你的肉里。{/n}

languages.text: {n}... entonces algo en su muñeca hace clic y un largo puñal recubierto de algo asqueroso sale de ella. Un momento después, el puñal se hunde en tu carne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...then something in his wrist clicks, and a long blade coated with something foul thrusts out of it. A moment later, the blade sinks into your flesh.{/n}

languages.text: {n}... dann klickt in seinem Handgelenk etwas und eine lange Klinge, die mit irgendetwas Widerlichem überzogen ist, schießt daraus hervor. Einen Augenblick später dringt die Klinge in dein Fleisch ein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...then something in his wrist clicks, and a long blade coated with something foul thrusts out of it. A moment later, the blade sinks into your flesh.{/n}

languages.text: {n}... et quelque chose dans son poignet cliquette, déployant une longue lame recouverte d'une substance infâme et qui vient s'enfoncer dans votre chair.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dilencinin bileğinde bir şey tak ediyor ve içinden iğrenç bir şeyle kaplı, uzun bir bıçak çıkıyor. Hemen ardından bıçağın etini parçalayıp vücuduna girdiğini hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...then something in his wrist clicks, and a long blade coated with something foul thrusts out of it. A moment later, the blade sinks into your flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bileğinde bir şey tak ediyor ve içinden iğrenç bir şeyle kaplı uzun bir bıçak çıkıyor. Hemen ardından bıçağın içine girdiğini hissediyorsun.{/n}
